EmailTemplate.name: Payroll Corrections - Additional Info Received
EmailTemplate.subject: Payroll Corrections - Additional Info Received
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.Name},
I have received the corrections document you uploaded. I will now begin working on your account.
Typically requests take less than a day to complete. If I exceed this expectation, I will let you know where I am at by the end of each business day until I am done.
Feel free to contact me if you have any further information to provide and I will get back with you as soon as I can.
Warmest Regards, {!Case.Case_Owner_First_Name__c} Intuit Payroll Corrections Team Member
This is an automated email. Please do not reply directly as you will not receive a response.
